sentence: Speaker, as part of the Congressional Field Hearing  on Haitian TPS Termination held in the Massachusetts 7th Congressional  District, witnesses from the community were invited to discuss the  importance of extending TPS for Haitian nationals.
title: Witness Testimony During the Congressional Field Hearing on Haitian Tps Termination

sentence: As the Representative of the 7th  Congressional District of Illinois, a district with a rich history of  Black culture and resilience, I fight in Congress for equity,  inclusion, and the honest American history.
title: Commemoration of Juneteenth Amid the Erosion of Black History

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's 7th Congressional District, it  is my honor to congratulate this school, staff, administration, and  board members for this accomplishment and thank them for their  commitment to our kids and our community.
title: Recognizing Canon City High School

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's 7th Congressional District, it  is my honor to congratulate Arvada High School on its 125th anniversary  and for its dedication to students in our community.

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's 7th Congressional District, it  is my honor to congratulate Foothills Regional Housing on their 50th  anniversary and thank them for all they do for our community.

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's 7th Congressional District, it  is my honor to thank Representative Bird for her dedication to serving  her community.

sentence: On behalf of the thousands of Greek Orthodox constituents who call  the Massachusetts 7th Congressional District home and the more than 300  million followers worldwide, it is an honor to host the longest serving  Archbishop of Constantinople in the Church's history and a humbling  opportunity to say thank you for his efforts on behalf of the entire  human family.
title: Recognizing His All-Holiness Ecumenical Patriarch Bartholomew

sentence: Speaker, I rise with gratitude and affection to  recognize the contributions of Sarah Kaplan Feinmann to Texas' 7th  Congressional District, to the United States House of Representatives,  and to the United States of America.
title: Recognizing Sarah Kaplan Feinmann

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's 7th Congressional District, it  is my honor to thank Mayor Bud Starker for his years of service and  wish him the best in all his future endeavors.
title: Recognizing Mayor Bud Starker

sentence: On behalf of the people of Colorado's 7th Congressional District, I  stand with the Evergreen community, offer my condolences to the victims  and their families, and reaffirm my commitment to ensuring every child  can go to school without fear for their safety.
title: Recognizing the Evergreen High School Shooting

sentence: The squad has logged thousands of hours administering  emergency assistance to others exemplifying the spirit of sacrifice and  volunteerism that embody New Jersey's 7th Congressional District.
